
``colSums_giotto``
======================

colSums_giotto

Description
-----------

colSums function that works with multiple matrix representations

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   colSums_giotto(mymatrix)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``mymatrix``
     - matrix object


Value
-----

numeric vector
